title: Principle of transitive induction.
content: If we have a statement that holds for some element, and a relation between elements that implies if it holds for the first element then it must hold for the second element, the principle of transitive induction shows the statement holds for any element related to the first by the (reflexive-)transitive closure of the relation.

blocks.name: relexpindlem
blocks.content: Principle of transitive induction, finite and non-class version. The first three hypotheses give various existences, the next three give necessary substitutions and the last two are the basis and the induction hypothesis. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.) (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: relexpind
blocks.content: Principle of transitive induction, finite version. The first three hypotheses give various existences, the next three give necessary substitutions and the last two are the basis and the induction hypothesis. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.) (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm relexpind(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wb(w2, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wb(w2, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), wb(w4, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w3)
  -| wi(w0, wi(wbr(cv(s3), c1, cv(s2)), wi(w5, w4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w5)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w2)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w2)
  -| diffsw(s3, w4)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  vtoclg(s2, c2, universe, wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w4))))
  mpcom(wceq(cv(s2), c2), wb(wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w4))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)))), wb(w4, w1))
  syl5ibr(wb(w4, w1), wceq(cv(s2), c2), wb(wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w4))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)))), wb(wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w1))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w1), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(s2), c2), wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w1, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2))
  breq2(cv(s2), c2, c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))
  bibi1d(wb(w4, w1), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w4))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w1))))
  imbi2d(wb(w4, w1), w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w4)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w1)))
  imbi2d(wb(w4, w1), wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w4), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), w1))
  imbi2(w4, w1, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), cv(s2)))
  relexpindlem(s0, s2, s1, s3, c0, c1, w0, w4, w2, w3, w5)
  diff.wi.s(s2, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)))
  diff.wi.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s2)
  diff.wi.s(s2, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2), w1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c1, crelexp, cv(s0))
  diff.crelexp.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: rtrclind
blocks.content: Principle of transitive induction. The first four hypotheses give various existences, the next four give necessary substitutions and the last two are the basis and the induction step. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rtrclind(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, cfv(crtcl, c1), c2), w1))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w2, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w4, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w3)
  -| wi(w0, wi(wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1)), wi(w5, w4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w5)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w4)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wi(wbr(c0, cfv(crtcl, c1), c2), w1), wceq(cfv(crtcl, c1), cfv(crtrcl, c1)))
  dfrtrcl2(c1, w0)
  syl5ibr(wceq(cfv(crtcl, c1), cfv(crtrcl, c1)), w0, wi(wbr(c0, cfv(crtcl, c1), c2), w1), wi(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w1))
  expcom(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w1)
  mpcom(wa(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0), w1, wrex(hs0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  biimpac(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0, wrex(hs0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  dfrtrclrec2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0), w1))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0), w1))
  expcom(wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0), w1)
  anassrs(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)), w1)
  syl3c(wa(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))), w1, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2))
  simprl(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0, wa(wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  simprrr(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  simprrl(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  relexpind(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4, w5)
  imbi1d(wceq(cfv(crtcl, c1), cfv(crtrcl, c1)), wbr(c0, cfv(crtcl, c1), c2), w1, wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2))
  breq(cfv(crtcl, c1), cfv(crtrcl, c1), c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), w0), w1))
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rtrclind(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[(t* ` c1)]c2 → w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → Rel(c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 →(w2 ↔ w5))
  ⊣ (s1 = c2 →(w4 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → w3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s2[c1]s1 →(w5 → w4)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w5)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w2)
  ⊣ d(s2, w4)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, (c0[(t* ` c1)]c2 → w1), (t* ` c1)=(t*rec ` c1))
  dfrtrcl2(c1, w0)
  syl5ibr((t* ` c1)=(t*rec ` c1), w0, (c0[(t* ` c1)]c2 → w1), (c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 → w1))
  expcom(w0, c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2, w1)
  mpcom((c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ∧ w0), w1, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2))
  biimpac(c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2, w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2))
  dfrtrclrec2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, cn0, c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2, ((c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ∧ w0)→ w1))
  expcom(hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2, ((c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ∧ w0)→ w1))
  expcom((c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0), (c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ∧ w0), w1)
  anassrs(c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2, w0, (c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0), w1)
  syl3c((c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ∧(w0 ∧(c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))), w1, w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2)
  simprl(c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2, w0, (c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))
  simprrr(c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2, w0, c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2, hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  simprrl(c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2, w0, c0[(c1[^r]hs0)]c2, hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  relexpind(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4, w5)
  imbi1d((t* ` c1)=(t*rec ` c1), c0[(t* ` c1)]c2, w1, c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2)
  breq((t* ` c1), (t*rec ` c1), c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ∧ w0)→ w1))
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
